official_title: To deauthorize a portion of the navigation project for Weymouth-Fore and Town Rivers, Massachusetts.

summary.text: Deauthorizes a specified channel portion of the project for navigation, Weymouth-Fore and Town Rivers, Massachusetts, previously authorized by the River and Harbor Act of 1965.
